summary.Title: Civil Foreman
summary.Presentation: Are you ready to play a key role in shaping the future of healthcare? We are seeking an experienced Civil Foreman to oversee daily construction activities, coordinate teams, and en

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Are you ready to play a key role in shaping the future of healthcare? We are seeking an experienced Civil Foreman to oversee daily construction activities, coordinate teams, and ensure that work meets the highest standards of quality, safety, and efficiency.

About the Role

As a Civil Foreman, you will manage on-site operations, supervise construction teams, and collaborate with engineers and project managers to meet deadlines and budget goals. Your responsibilities will include maintaining quality assurance, adhering to safety protocols, and keeping accurate documentation of progress and materials.

About You

You are a natural leader with a diploma or degree in Civil Engineering and proven experience as a Civil Foreman. You bring strong technical knowledge, effective communication skills, and the ability to manage teams and schedules. Proficiency in interpreting blueprints and basic computer skills are essential.

About Us

The Køge Hospital Project is a landmark initiative that expands and renovates Køge Hospital, bringing cutting-edge healthcare facilities to Denmark’s Region of Zealand. Managed by leading Italian firms Itinera and CMB, we pride ourselves on innovation, quality, and safety.

Join us to make an impact, work in a multicultural environment, and help deliver a facility that will serve future generations.

Apply today and be part of this transformative journey!
